title: BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Says Will Be Taking Market Downtime At Fortress Specialty Cellulose Mill
text:
BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Says Will Be Taking Market Downtime At Fortress Specialty Cellulose Mill

Economy 1 hour ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Says Will Be Taking Market Downtime At Fortress Specialty Cellulose Mill Oct 7 (Reuters) - Fortress Global Enterprises Inc : * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES ANNOUNCES MARKET DOWNTIME * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - WILL BE TAKING MARKET DOWNTIME AT FORTRESS SPECIALTY CELLULOSE MILL * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - WILL DEPLOY A TEMPORARY MARKET CURTAILMENT STRATEGY TO PRESERVE OPTION OF RESTARTING MILL ONCE PRICES REBOUND * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - WILL TAKE MARKET DOWNTIME AT THE FSC MILL COMMENCING OCTOBER 8TH, 2019 FOR AN UNSPECIFIED INTERIM PERIOD * FORTRESS - ONGOING U.S.-CHINA TRADE DISPUTE, WEAKENING CHINESE DOMESTIC TEXTILE, APPAREL CONSUMPTION DESTABILIZED DISSOLVING PULP DEMAND * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - CONTINUE TO BE CONFIDENT IN FUTURE PRICING AND PROSPECTS FOR DISSOLVING PULP * FORTRESS GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC - ALLOCATED RESOURCES TO ENABLE TO RESTART THE FSC MILL ON AN EXPEDITED BASIS

BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Says Will Be Taking Market Downtime At Fortress Specialty Cellulose Mill
description: BRIEF-Fortress Global Enterprises Says Will Be Taking Market Downtime At Fortress Specialty Cellulose Mill
